recipes.name: Pasta
steps: Boil water and cook spaghetti until al dente.
Whisk eggs and parmesan together in a bowl.
Drain pasta and mix with pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture.
Season with salt and pepper, then serve.
recipes.dietaryRestrictions: Contains dairy, eggs, pork, and gluten

recipes.name: Greek Salad
steps: Chop tomatoes, cucumber, and onion into chunks.
Combine vegetables with olives and crumbled feta in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with oregano.
